QuestData.Title: A Shadowed Fate
QuestData.Description:
The Mawsworn... torture and torment souls within Ruin's Cradle.
I... barely escaped, but I'm afraid I won't last long.
Their twisted rituals... breaking souls to serve as wretched shades.
Spare them this fate!
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Tormented Souls in Ruin's Cradle by stomping out the Circles of Agony binding them.
QuestData.RewardText:
You have... saved these souls from a terrible fate.
Even a... true end... cannot be worse than this torment...
